patthana1.22:1.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— ajjhattārammaṇaṁ
patthana1.22:1.1_1: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe… paṭisandhikkhaṇe ajjhattārammaṇaṁ
patthana1.22:1.1_2: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.22:2.1_0: Bahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— bahiddhārammaṇaṁ
patthana1.22:2.1_1: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe… paṭisandhikkhaṇe bahiddhārammaṇaṁ
patthana1.22:2.1_2: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.22:3.1: Ajjhattārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā …pe… avigatapaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana1.22:4.1: Hetupaccayā ārammaṇe dve (saṅkhittaṁ, sabbattha dve), avigate dve. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.22:6.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ
patthana1.22:6.1_1: ajjhattārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe… ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana1.22:6.1_2: ajjhattārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe… vicikicchāsahagate
patthana1.22:6.1_3: uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana1.22:7.1_0: Bahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ
patthana1.22:7.1_1: bahiddhārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe… ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana1.22:7.1_2: …pe… vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana1.22:8.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā
patthana1.22:9.1_0: Bahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—arūpe
patthana1.22:9.1_1: bahiddhārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe… napacchājātapaccayā
patthana1.22:10.1: Bahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—bahiddhārammaṇe khandhe paṭicca bahiddhārammaṇā cetanā.
patthana1.22:11.1: Ajjhattārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati navipākapaccayā (paṭisandhi natthi) … najhānapaccayā …pe… pañcaviññāṇasahagataṁ ajjhattārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ …pe….
patthana1.22:12.1_0: Bahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati najhānapaccayā—pañcaviññāṇasahagataṁ
patthana1.22:12.1_1: bahiddhārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… namaggapaccayā … navippayuttapaccayā—arūpe
patthana1.22:12.1_2: ajjhattārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe….
patthana1.22:13.1: Bahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati navippayuttapaccayā—arūpe bahiddhārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe….
patthana1.22:14.1: Nahetuyā dve, naadhipatiyā dve, napurejāte dve, napacchājāte dve, naāsevane nakamme navipāke najhāne namagge navippayutte dve. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.22:16.1: Hetupaccayā naadhipatiyā dve …pe… navipāke dve, navippayutte dve. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.22:18.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe dve, anantare dve, samanantare dve …pe… magge dve …pe… avigate dve. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.22:21.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— ajjhattārammaṇā
patthana1.22:21.1_1: hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe ajjhattārammaṇā
patthana1.22:22.1: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— bahiddhārammaṇā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ …pe… paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe….
patthana1.22:23.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— ajjhattaṁ
patthana1.22:23.1_2: ajjhattaṁ dibbaṁ cakkhuṁ paccavekkhati, dibbaṁ sotadhātuṁ …pe… iddhividhañāṇaṁ …pe…
patthana1.22:23.1_4: Ariyā ajjhattārammaṇe pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti,
patthana1.22:23.1_5: pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti. Ajjhattārammaṇe ajjhatte khandhe aniccato …pe…
patthana1.22:23.1_6: vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha ajjhattārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati …pe…
patthana1.22:23.1_7: domanassaṁ uppajjati. Ajjhattārammaṇā ajjhattā khandhā pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa,
patthana1.22:24.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— bahiddhā
patthana1.22:24.1_2: bahiddhā dibbaṁ cakkhuṁ paccavekkhati, dibbaṁ sotadhātuṁ …pe… iddhividhañāṇaṁ …pe…
patthana1.22:24.1_4: ajjhattārammaṇe bahiddhā khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati …pe… cetopariyañāṇena
patthana1.22:24.1_5: ajjhattārammaṇabahiddhācittasamaṅgissa cittaṁ jānāti, ajjhattārammaṇā bahiddhā khandhā
patthana1.22:25.1_0: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— bahiddhārammaṇaṁ
patthana1.22:25.1_1: bahiddhā dibbaṁ cakkhuṁ paccavekkhati, dibbaṁ sotadhātuṁ paccavekkhati. Iddhividhañāṇaṁ
patthana1.22:25.1_3: paccavekkhati. Bahiddhārammaṇe bahiddhā khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati
patthana1.22:26.1_0: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— dānaṁ
patthana1.22:26.1_1: datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati,
patthana1.22:26.1_2: jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṁ paccavekkhati. Ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ paccavekkhanti,
patthana1.22:26.1_3: phalaṁ paccavekkhanti, bahiddhārammaṇe pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite
patthana1.22:26.1_4: kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti. Bahiddhārammaṇaṁ ajjhattaṁ
patthana1.22:26.1_5: dibbaṁ cakkhuṁ paccavekkhati, dibbaṁ sotadhātuṁ … iddhividhañāṇaṁ … cetopariyañāṇaṁ
patthana1.22:26.1_7: ajjhatte khandhe aniccato …pe… vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha ajjhattārammaṇo
patthana1.22:26.1_8: rāgo uppajjati …pe… domanassaṁ uppajjati. Bahiddhārammaṇā ajjhattā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa,
patthana1.22:26.1_9: pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:27.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana1.22:27.1_1: sahajātādhipati. Ārammaṇādhipati—ajjhattaṁ viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati,
patthana1.22:27.1_2: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati. Ajjhattārammaṇaṁ ajjhattaṁ dibbaṁ
patthana1.22:27.1_3: cakkhuṁ garuṁ katvā …pe… dibbaṁ sotadhātuṁ …pe… iddhividhañāṇaṁ … pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṁ
patthana1.22:27.1_4: … yathākammūpagañāṇaṁ … anāgataṁsañāṇaṁ garuṁ katvā …pe… ajjhattārammaṇe ajjhatte
patthana1.22:27.1_5: khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā ajjhattārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati,
patthana1.22:28.1: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. Sahajātādhipati—bahiddhārammaṇādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:29.1_0: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. Ārammaṇādhipati—dānaṁ
patthana1.22:29.1_1: datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati, pubbe
patthana1.22:29.1_2: suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati, jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā …pe… ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ …
patthana1.22:29.1_3: phalaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti. Bahiddhārammaṇaṁ ajjhattaṁ dibbaṁ cakkhuṁ garuṁ
patthana1.22:29.1_4: katvā …pe… dibbaṁ sotadhātuṁ … iddhividhañāṇaṁ … cetopariyañāṇaṁ … pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṁ
patthana1.22:29.1_5: … yathākammūpagañāṇaṁ … anāgataṁsañāṇaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati, bahiddhārammaṇe
patthana1.22:29.1_6: ajjhatte khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā ajjhattārammaṇo
patthana1.22:30.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— purimā
patthana1.22:30.1_1: purimā ajjhattārammaṇā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ ajjhattārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ
patthana1.22:31.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— ajjhattārammaṇaṁ
patthana1.22:31.1_1: cuticittaṁ bahiddhārammaṇassa upapatticittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. Ajjhattārammaṇaṁ
patthana1.22:31.1_2: bhavaṅgaṁ bahiddhārammaṇāya āvajjanāya anantarapaccayena paccayo. Ajjhattārammaṇā
patthana1.22:31.1_3: khandhā bahiddhārammaṇassa vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. Ajjhattārammaṇaṁ
patthana1.22:31.1_4: anulomaṁ gotrabhussa … anulomaṁ vodānassa … anulomaṁ phalasamāpattiyā … nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa
patthana1.22:32.1_0: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— purimā
patthana1.22:32.1_1: purimā bahiddhārammaṇā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ bahiddhārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ
patthana1.22:32.1_2: anantarapaccayena paccayo. Bahiddhārammaṇaṁ anulomaṁ gotrabhussa … anulomaṁ vodānassa
patthana1.22:32.1_3: … gotrabhu maggassa … vodānaṁ maggassa … maggo phalassa … phalaṁ phalassa … anulomaṁ
patthana1.22:33.1_0: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— bahiddhārammaṇaṁ
patthana1.22:33.1_1: cuticittaṁ ajjhattārammaṇassa upapatticittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. Bahiddhārammaṇaṁ
patthana1.22:33.1_2: bhavaṅgaṁ ajjhattārammaṇāya āvajjanāya anantarapaccayena paccayo. Bahiddhārammaṇā
patthana1.22:34.1: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo …pe… sahajātapaccayena paccayo … aññamaññapaccayena paccayo … nissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:35.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana1.22:36.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—anantarūpanissayo,
patthana1.22:37.1_0: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—anantarūpanissayo,
patthana1.22:38.1_0: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana1.22:39.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo— purimā
patthana1.22:39.1_1: purimā ajjhattārammaṇā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ ajjhattārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ
patthana1.22:40.1: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo— ajjhattārammaṇaṁ anulomaṁ gotrabhussa, anulomaṁ vodānassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:41.1_0: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo— purimā
patthana1.22:41.1_1: purimā bahiddhārammaṇā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ bahiddhārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ
patthana1.22:41.1_2: āsevanapaccayena paccayo. Bahiddhārammaṇaṁ anulomaṁ gotrabhussa … anulomaṁ vodānassa
patthana1.22:41.1_3: … gotrabhu maggassa … vodānaṁ maggassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:42.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo— sahajātā,
patthana1.22:42.1_1: nānākkhaṇikā. Sahajātā—ajjhattārammaṇā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena
patthana1.22:42.1_2: paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe…. Nānākkhaṇikā—ajjhattārammaṇā cetanā vipākānaṁ ajjhattārammaṇānaṁ
patthana1.22:43.1: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo. Nānākkhaṇikā—ajjhattārammaṇā cetanā vipākānaṁ bahiddhārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:44.1_0: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo— sahajātā,
patthana1.22:44.1_1: nānākkhaṇikā. Sahajātā—bahiddhārammaṇā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena
patthana1.22:44.1_2: paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe…. Nānākkhaṇikā—bahiddhārammaṇā cetanā vipākānaṁ bahiddhārammaṇānaṁ
patthana1.22:45.1: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo. Nānākkhaṇikā—bahiddhārammaṇā cetanā vipākānaṁ ajjhattārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:46.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.22:46.1_1: āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo … jhānapaccayena paccayo … maggapaccayena
patthana1.22:46.1_2: paccayo … sampayuttapaccayena paccayo … atthipaccayena paccayo … natthipaccayena
patthana1.22:47.1_0: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare cattāri, samanantare cattāri,
patthana1.22:47.1_1: sahajāte dve, aññamaññe dve, nissaye dve, upanissaye cattāri, āsevane tīṇi, kamme
patthana1.22:47.1_2: cattāri, vipāke dve …pe… (sabbattha dve), sampayutte dve, atthiyā dve, natthiyā cattāri,
patthana1.22:49.1: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:50.1: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:51.1: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:52.1: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:53.1_0: Nahetuyā cattāri, naārammaṇe cattāri, naadhipatiyā cattāri, naanantare cattāri (saṅkhittaṁ,
patthana1.22:53.1_1: sabbattha cattāri), napurejāte napacchājāte naāsevane …pe… navippayutte cattāri …pe…
patthana1.22:55.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe dve, naadhipatiyā dve, naanantare nasamanantare naupanissaye naāsevane nakamme …pe… nonatthiyā novigate dve. (Sabbattha dve. Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.22:57.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare cattāri, samanantare cattāri,
patthana1.22:57.1_1: sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye dve, upanissaye cattāri, āsevane tīṇi, kamme cattāri,
patthana1.22:57.1_2: vipāke dve …pe… sampayutte dve, atthiyā dve, natthiyā cattāri, vigate cattāri, avigate
